I would be quite happy for science textbooks to have the disclaimer. 
 
 "The theory of evolution in this book is not presented in a way that it is suitabe for either side of the debates on abortion, gay marriage or wether or not god exists."

post_info.post_title: We should admit evolution is not linked to the abortion debate.
